Creating Peace of Mind by Pioneering Safety and Security

At Allegion, we help keep the people you know and love safe and secure where they live, work and visit. With more than 30 brands, 11,000+ employees globally and products sold in 130 countries, we specialize in security around the doorway and beyond.
Division 28 Security Consultant Business Development Manager-Remote California
(Territory includes Southern California)
Job Scope
The Business Development Manager DIV28 Security Consultant position will have overall responsibility to develop and implement a comprehensive strategy driving growth with the Division 28 Electronic Security Specifiers and Consultants in the North America market. The roles primary focus includes developing relationships with key influencers for Division 28 specifications, writing Division 28 subsections relevant to Allegion solutions, identifying new opportunities and partnerships for Allegion, and increasing the close ratio of electronics sales into projects initiated through Division 8710

specifications.

In addition, this individual will develop relationships with the PACs A&E Security Consulting Teams to drive adoption of Allegion solutions and value-added services.
What You Will Do:
Assist in the evolution of the existing Division 8 to Division 28 collaboration strategy in an effort to increase program effectiveness and close ratio with Allegion Project and Channel sales teams.

Cultivate new relationships with Division 28 security specifiers across the A&E community, coordinate with local RSO.

Write Division 28 specifications for all relevant subsections while working through the project security consultant or direct with end users.

Lead the project response team for large electronics RFPs.

Manage and coordinate industry events targeting electronic security specifiers as need for networking, market analysis and prospecting

Provide electronics SME support to existing Allegion specification writers, ACA team, and provide training as necessary

Provide direction at Regional Sales Offices (ESE, ISC & End User Consultants) to enable local support for A&E Security

Consultant/Specifiers

to coordinate efforts for the adoption of both Allegions Electronics portfolio and collaboration within the Overtur Specification Service

Partner with Allegion PACS team to develop and grow the A&E Program through collaboration with the Allegion PACs Partners respective A&E Teams for the adoption of Allegions Electronics portfolio.

Lead education efforts for electronic security specifiers encompassing Allegions value-added services and adoption of Schlages Credential and Hardware Open Interoperability Platform.

What You Will Need to Succeed:
Bachelors degree in business or related field preferred

5 years writing Division 28 specifications for electronic security preferred

Working knowledge of new construction and aftermarket distribution business models

Working knowledge of access control and video management systems

Ability to think strategically and problem solve with entrepreneurial commitment to achieving goals

Demonstrated ability to collaborate with local and strategic sales teams and other Allegion functions

Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Demonstrated experience influencing others with a bias for action

Strong presentation skills required

Travel up to 50%

Preferred Experience & Certifications
Experience and understanding of Division 8 and Division 27 specifications preferred

Experience with complex access control reader & credential system deployment including high frequency smart & mobile credentials

Ability to create electrical elevation & riser diagrams as required for project specification support

Relevant certifications: PE, CSEIP, PSP, CSPM, CCNA/RCDD, DCDC, CDT

Why Work for Us?
Allegion is a Great Place to Grow your Career if:
You're seeking a rewarding opportunity that allows you to truly help others. With thousands of employees and customers around the world, theres plenty of room to make an impact. As our values state, this is your business, run with it.

Youre looking for a company that will invest in your professional development. As we grow, we want you to grow with us.

You want a culture that promotes work-life balance. Our employees enjoy generous paid time off, because at Allegion we recognize that you have a full life outside of work!

What Youll Get from Us:
Health, dental and vision insurance coverage, helping you be safe, be healthy

Unlimited Paid Time Off

A commitment to your future with a 401K plan, which currently offers a 6% company match and no vesting period

Health Savings Accounts Tax-advantaged savings account used for healthcare expenses

Flexible Spending Accounts Tax-advantaged spending accounts for healthcare and/or dependent daycare expenses

Disability Insurance Short-Term and Long-Term coverage, paid for by Allegion, provides income replacement for illness or injury

Life Insurance Term life coverage with the option to purchase supplemental coverage

Tuition

Reimbursement

Voluntary Wellness Program Simply complete wellness activities and earn up to $2,000 in rewards

Employee Discounts through

Perks at Work
